alert.note: Alert for Benson; Cavalier; Pembina; Ramsey; Towner; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 3:46PM CST until December 14 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch through Wednesday morning. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Minnesota and northeast North Dakota. * WHEN...From 6 AM Tuesday to noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes. Heaviest snowfall rates will be during the day Tuesday into Tuesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... The highest ice accumulations are expected to be in southeastern North Dakota, where up to two tenths of an inch is possible. An additional 2 to 3 inches of snow, freezing drizzle, and blowing snow are expected through the rest of Wednesday and Thursday. This could prolong impacts beyond Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: Benson; Cavalier; Pembina; Ramsey; Towner; Western Walsh County
